docs.snippet: Hundreds of Nigerians marched through the streets of Lagos calling for a change of government on Monday, a rare show of public dissent that reflected mounting anger over an absentee president and a sputtering economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of Nigerians marched through the streets of Lagos calling for a change of government on Monday, a rare show of public dissent that reflected mounting anger over an absentee president and a sputtering economy.

headline.main: Beset by Economic, Political Woes, Nigerians Protest for Change
headline.print_headline: Beset by Economic, Political Woes, Nigerians Protest for Change

docs.snippet: Anglo American's diamond unit De Beers will keep its diamond exploration budget steady at $35 million in 2017, the company said, although it has turned to new technology to try to improve the rate of discoveries....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anglo American's diamond unit De Beers will keep its diamond exploration budget steady at $35 million in 2017, the company said, although it has turned to new technology to try to improve the rate of discoveries.

headline.main: De Beers to Hold Diamond Exploration Spend Steady in 2017
headline.print_headline: De Beers to Hold Diamond Exploration Spend Steady in 2017

docs.snippet: Montenegro's main opposition party said Monday that it will organize a referendum on the country's membership in NATO — with the support of Russia — if the ruling pro-Western majority keeps insisting the decision should be made in parl...
docs.lead_paragraph: Montenegro's main opposition party said Monday that it will organize a referendum on the country's membership in NATO — with the support of Russia — if the ruling pro-Western majority keeps insisting the decision should be made in parliament.

headline.main: Pro-Russian Opposition in Montenegro Plans NATO Referendum
headline.print_headline: Pro-Russian Opposition in Montenegro Plans NATO Referendum

docs.snippet: U.S. stocks slipped on Monday, led by the energy sector as oil prices dropped, while investors awaited the next run of major earnings reports and sought further clarity on President Donald Trump's economic policies....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks slipped on Monday, led by the energy sector as oil prices dropped, while investors awaited the next run of major earnings reports and sought further clarity on President Donald Trump's economic policies.

byline.original: By THE NEW YORK TIMES and REUTERS

docs.snippet: On Monday, Queen Elizabeth II marks her Sapphire Jubilee, becoming the first British monarch to reign for 65 years. It's just one of many milestones the queen has marked in her nine decades. Here's are some other significant numbers about her reco...
docs.lead_paragraph: On Monday, Queen Elizabeth II marks her Sapphire Jubilee, becoming the first British monarch to reign for 65 years. It's just one of many milestones the queen has marked in her nine decades. Here's are some other significant numbers about her record-breaking life and reign:

headline.main: Queen's 65-Year Reign a Milestone in a Record-Breaking Life
headline.print_headline: Queen's 65-Year Reign a Milestone in a Record-Breaking Life
